skewt module¶

An implementation of the skew-t and skew-normal distributions for SciPy

class skewt.skewnorm_gen(momtype=1, a=None, b=None, xtol=1e-14, badvalue=None, name=None, longname=None, shapes=None, extradoc=None)¶

Bases: scipy.stats.distributions.rv_continuous

The skew-normal distribution

%(before_notes)s

This replicates the functionality of the sn distribution from the package of the same name in CRAN. See http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/sn/ for more information.

%(example)s
